Translations.Text: Kazhete, "BOH bude dostatniy tomu shcho svidok mizh meni ta vy. Vin znaye vse u nebi ta zemli. Bezsumnivno, tsey khto viryatʹ v falsehood ta disbelieve u BOHU yavlyayutʹ soboyu realʹnyy losers
Vony vyklyk vy prynesty retribution! Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya predetermined pryznachennya, retribution by prybuv yim nehayno. Zvychayno, tse prybude yim raptom, koly vony naymenshi ochikuyutʹ tse
Vony vyklyk vy prynesty retribution! Peklo vzhe otochuye disbelievers
denʹ prybude koly retribution overwhelms yim, zverkhu yim ta z vnyzu yikhnikh nih; Vin skazhe, "Kushtuyutʹ naslidky vashykh pratsʹ
O Moyi sluzhbovtsi shcho vvazhaly, Moya zemlya ye prostora, tak obozhnyuyutʹ Meni
Kozhnyy pokushtuye smertʹ, todi do nas vy budete ostatochno vertatysya
Tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedemo spravedlyve zhyttya, my bezsumnivno ulahodymo yikh u Rayu, z osobnyakamy ta techuchymy potokamy. Vichno vony perebuyutʹ tam. Shcho krasyva vynahoroda dlya pratsivnykiv
Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu kotri steadfastly persevere, ta dovira u yikhnʹomu Lordi
Bahato vytvoru shcho ne nosytʹ yoho zabezpechennya, BOH zabezpechuye dlya tse, tak zhe, yak i dlya vas. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Omniscient
Yakshcho vy prosyte yikh, "Khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu, ta stavyte sontse ta misyatsʹ u vashiy sluzhbi," vony skazhutʹ, "BOH." Chomu todi vony deviate
BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zbilʹshuye zapobizhni zakhody whomever Vin vybyraye z chysla Yoho stvorinʹ, ta utrymuye tse. BOH znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
Yakshcho vy prosyte yikh, "Khto posylaye vnyz z neba voda, shchob vidnovyty mertvu zemlyu," vony skazhutʹ, "BOH." Skazhitʹ, "Khvalyatʹ BOHA." Bilʹshistʹ yikh ne rozumiyutʹ
